title: A Good Urdu Translation of the Quran â€“ Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: the next question posed by mohsin munir from bradford from uk can you recommend any good urdu translation of the quran for my parents a similar question asked by mubina hashmi from pakistan i am a muslim and i want to read the urdu translation of the quran kindly recommend me a translation book aura of seed i normally read the english language of the quran my urdu is weak as faith reading is concerned but i did ask some of the people who are knowledgeable in the field of islam and they told me that one of the good translations in the urdu language is asan rubaiyan by mawlana mohammad junagadhi it's also printed by the king fat printing press in madina saudi arabia and the second good translation urdu is the quran by sheikh lokman salafi who was the secretary of sheikh bin bas ramallah may allah have mostly your name so these two are the good of the translation with authentic and inshallah if you read them you will benefit
